question: Match the following: I. Zn²⁺ with (i) d⁸ (ii) colourless (iii) μ=1.73BM. II. Cu²⁺ with ... III. Ni²⁺ with ...
explanation: I. Zn²⁺ (3d¹⁰): Full d-shell, no unpaired electrons, diamagnetic, Colourless (ii).
II. Cu²⁺ (3d⁹): 1 unpaired electron. Magnetic moment μ = √(1(1+2)) = √3 = 1.73 BM (iii).
